text:
Hi, Matilda! I worked as a freelancer for them once. Though their reputation isn't the best, they are a reference in content marketing here in Brazil.
My only experience with their products is Studio. The platform offers nice previews of social media, but it is a bit slow. In addition, I contacted the support, but I had to resolve the issue myself hahah it happened twice. Anyways, I encourage you just to try, but with low expectations
